OOC( Actually that was really a great way to introduce a bot like 
that. Excellent.)


-- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Whistler::
>     "Aw blast it do you always have to fight."  Whistler starts to 
fire his 
> one shoulder machine gun (as the other was damaged by the shot) 
randomly.  
> Just then a stasis pod crashes nearby distracting him.
> 
> ::Aerotaur::
>     The stasis pod on top of a rather unusual scene.  It lands on 
top of an 
> early human that had just killed a horse and a large bird.  Having 
crushed 
> them and damaged on the way down The stasis pod could not determine 
the true 
> bone structure it was scanning.  The net result was a noble 
creature with the 
> lower body of a horse, the upper body of a humanoid, and two large, 
angelic 
> wings sprouting out of the humanoid's back.  He looks around and 
heads toward 
> the commotion nearby.
> 
> OOC: I know that was weird but it was the best way I could come up 
with to 
> explain a winged centaur bot being created.
